Game.Name: Sapo Xule vs. Os Invasores do Brejo (Brazil)
Game.plot: You're Psycho Fox, an extraordinary fox that goes out to save the world from the wicked Madfox Daimyojin. He's the powerful, evil fox that sends out all sorts of bizarre creatures to conquer the world. Watch out for those trick stairways and disappearing bridges! The Madfox has completely changed the landscape - just to give you a hard time! Sounds like a tough trek? Don't give up yet! You have the power to transform into other animals to help you get through certain obstacles. Remember, you're not an average fox, you're Psycho Fox!Cheat: Skip a levelOn world 1-3 where there are a few springs going up to the top of the screen. Go to the top of these and whilst still on the top one through your bird fly. After a few times of this a hole will appear. Enter this hole and you will go to a level with no baddies and to ways to go. If you take the route down, go through the first "pipe" and you will be transported to world 5-1.
Game.Notes: Sapo Xul√© Vs Os Invasores do Brejo is a retooled version of Psycho Fox, released by Tectoy in 1995 for a Brazillian audience.
